A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is just not good. It's not terrible\, not the worse movie ever but it is in no way good {or great as critics say.) Even as a stand alone sci-fi movie\, it's mediocre at best. Goofy characters\, lame jokes that don't land\, and a story that doesn't not make you feel any emotion towards any characters. I'm not a Star wars purest but more a sci-fi fan and this movie does nothing to help the genre.
